name: Under a Desert Sun
description: Join Jack in Under a Desert Sun, an adventure game in which you must return a magical artifact before the Nazi's get their hands on it and turn the tide of war! Fight the ever growing mummy army and the Nazi's to avoid all out doom!
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 (7,8 untested) Processor: I5 @ 3,5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 980 GTX or equivelant Storage: 4000 MB available space
